PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08172024-06-21GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Amendments to Annex III of the Rotterdam Convention on the Prior Informed Consent Procedure for Certain Hazardous Chemicals and Pesticides in International Trade
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to accept, on behalf of Canada, the AMENDMENTS TO ANNEX III OF THE ROTTERDAM CONVENTION ON THE PRIOR INFORMED CONSENT PROCEDURE FOR CERTAIN HAZARDOUS CHEMICALS AND PESTICIDES IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE, adopted during the tenth meeting of the Conference of the Parties to the Rotterdam Convention held in Geneva from May 1 to 12, 2023
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to accept, on behalf of Canada, the AMENDMENTS TO ANNEX III OF THE ROTTERDAM CONVENTION ON THE PRIOR INFORMED CONSENT PROCEDURE FOR CERTAIN HAZARDOUS CHEMICALS AND PESTICIDES IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE, adopted during the tenth meeting of the Conference of the Parties to the Rotterdam Convention held in Geneva from May 1 to 12, 2023
